sourcesContent:
"use client" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useRouter, useSearchParams } from "next/navigation" import { ArrowLeft, MoreHorizontal, Heart, Activity, Stethoscope, Plus, Zap, Clock, User, Calendar } from "lucide-react" export default function TicketPage() { const router = useRouter() const searchParams = useSearchParams() const [ticketData, setTicketData] = useState({ ticketNumber: "", priority: "", arrivalTime: "", appointmentTime: "", doctorName: "", patientName: "", date: "", queuePosition: 0, }) const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true) // Generate a unique ticket number const generateTicketNumber = () => { const timestamp = Date.now().toString(36) const random = Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 5) return `${timestamp}${random}`.toLowerCase() } // Calculate priority based on appointment time and doctor availability const calculatePriority = (appointmentTime, doctorAvailability) => { const hour = Number.parseInt(appointmentTime.split(":")[0]) const isAM = appointmentTime.includes("AM") const actualHour = isAM ? hour : hour + 12 // Morning appointments (9-11 AM) get higher priority if (actualHour >= 9 && actualHour <= 11) { return doctorAvailability === "busy" ? "High" : "First" } // Afternoon appointments (2-4 PM) get medium priority else if (actualHour >= 14 && actualHour <= 16) { return doctorAvailability === "available" ? "First" : "Medium" } // Other times get standard priority else { return "Standard" } } // Calculate arrival time (30 minutes before appointment) const calculateArrivalTime = (appointmentTime) => { const [time, period] = appointmentTime.split(" ") const [hours, minutes] = time.split(":").map(Number) let totalMinutes = hours * 60 + minutes if (period === "PM" && hours !== 12) totalMinutes += 12 * 60 if (period === "AM" && hours === 12) totalMinutes = minutes // Subtract 30 minutes totalMinutes -= 30 const arrivalHours = Math.floor(totalMinutes / 60) const arrivalMins = totalMinutes % 60 let displayHours = arrivalHours let displayPeriod = "AM" if (arrivalHours >= 12) { displayPeriod = "PM" if (arrivalHours > 12) displayHours = arrivalHours - 12 } if (arrivalHours === 0) displayHours = 12 return `${displayHours.toString().padStart(2, "0")}:${arrivalMins.toString().padStart(2, "0")} ${displayPeriod}` } // Generate queue position based on priority and time const generateQueuePosition = (priority, appointmentTime) => { const basePosition = Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1 switch (priority) { case "First": return basePosition case "High": return basePosition + Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) case "Medium": return basePosition + Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 3 case "Standard": return basePosition + Math.floor(Math.random() * 8) + 5 default: return basePosition } } useEffect(() => { // Simulate loading effect const loadingTimer = setTimeout(() => { // Get appointment data from URL parameters const doctorName = searchParams.get("doctorName") || "Dr. Unknown" const date = searchParams.get("date") || "" const time = searchParams.get("time") || "" const doctorAvailability = searchParams.get("availability") || "available" // Get patient name from localStorage const savedData = localStorage.getItem("signInFormData") let patientName = "Patient" if (savedData) { const parsedData = JSON.parse(savedData) patientName = parsedData.fullName || "Patient" } // Generate ticket data const ticketNumber = generateTicketNumber() const priority = calculatePriority(time, doctorAvailability) const arrivalTime = calculateArrivalTime(time) const queuePosition = generateQueuePosition(priority, time) setTicketData({ ticketNumber, priority, arrivalTime, appointmentTime: time, doctorName, patientName, date, queuePosition, }) // Save ticket to localStorage for future reference const ticketInfo = { ticketNumber, priority, arrivalTime, appointmentTime: time, doctorName, patientName, date, queuePosition, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), } const existingTickets = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userTickets") || "[]") existingTickets.push(ticketInfo) localStorage.setItem("userTickets", JSON.stringify(existingTickets)) setIsLoading(false) }, 2000) return () => clearTimeout(loadingTimer) }, []) // Empty dependency array to run only once const handleBack = () => { router.push("/home") } const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case "First": return "from-green-400 to-green-600" case "High": return "from-orange-400 to-orange-600" case "Medium": return "from-yellow-400 to-yellow-600" case "Standard": return "from-blue-400 to-blue-600" default: return "from-gray-400 to-gray-600" } } const getPriorityIcon = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case "First": return case "High": return case "Medium": return case "Standard": return default: return } } const formatDate = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString) return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", { weekday: "long", year: "numeric", month: "long", day: "numeric", }) } if (isLoading) { return (
{/* Animated Background Elements */}

Generating Your Ticket

Please wait while we process your appointment...

) } return (
{/* Animated Background Elements */}
{/* Floating Medical Icons */}
{/* Animated Gradient Orbs */}
{/* Enhanced Header */}
{/* Animated Background Pattern */}

BETSHOW

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Success Message with Animation */}

YOUR APPOINTMENT
HAS BEEN BOOKED

{/* Celebration particles */}
{/* Success checkmark animation */}
{/* Enhanced Ticket Badge */}
{/* Glowing background effect */}
{/* Animated background pattern */}

Ticket badge no:

{ticketData.ticketNumber}
{/* Enhanced Priority Section */}

Priority:

{getPriorityIcon(ticketData.priority)} {ticketData.priority}
{ticketData.queuePosition > 0 && (

You are #{ticketData.queuePosition} in the queue

)}
{/* Enhanced Arrival Instructions */}
Please arrive by
{ticketData.arrivalTime}
for your {ticketData.appointmentTime} appointment

⏰ (30 minutes before your scheduled time)

{/* Enhanced Appointment Details */}

Appointment Summary

Patient: {ticketData.patientName}
Doctor: {ticketData.doctorName}
Date: {formatDate(ticketData.date)}
Time: {ticketData.appointmentTime}
Ticket ID: {ticketData.ticketNumber}
{/* Enhanced Important Notes */}

Important Notes

  • Please bring a valid ID and your ABHA card
  • Arrive 30 minutes early for registration
  • Keep this ticket number for reference
  • Contact hospital if you need to reschedule
{/* Enhanced Action Buttons */}
{/* Custom CSS for enhanced animations */}
) }
